files.patch:
@@ -2348,3 +2348,4 @@
-# 0: symbol, 1: name, 2: list of annotation, 3: message segment
-compiler.err.type.annotation.not.found=\
-    Cannot read type annotations on {0}.{1} ({2}): {3}
+# 0: list of annotation, 1: symbol, 2: name, 3: message segment
+compiler.err.cant.attach.type.annotations=\
+    Cannot attach type annotations {0} to {1}.{2}:\n\
+    {3}

@@ -44,1 +44,1 @@
-compiler.err.type.annotation.not.found                  # bad class file
+compiler.err.cant.attach.type.annotations               # bad class file
